desc: Showing original paintings by Shinya Kumazawa in Toronto, Canada and original sculptures by Hanako Kumazawa in Tuscany, Italy. Both of their works are nature-inspired. Shinya works in oil on canvas while Hanako works in stone, terra cotta, bronze and wood.

layout.text:
Paintings/Sculptures by Shinya Kumazawa
Sculptures by Hanako Kumazawa
